Package javax.servlet

Interface ServletContainerInitializer

All Known Implementing Classes:
AnnotationScanInitializer, ApacheMultiPartInitializer, AuthenticationInitializer, AuthorizationInitializer, AuthorizationPreInitializer, HazelcastInitializer, JakartaSecurityAllInitializer, JakartaSecurityInitializer, JasperInitializer, JMXServerInitializer, MojarraInitializer, MyFacesInitializer, OpenWebBeansInitializer, SoteriaInitializer, SoteriaPreCDIInitializer, TempDirInitializer, WebAnnotationInitializer, WebXmlInitializer, WeldInitializer
public interface ServletContainerInitializer
The ServletContainerInitializer API.
Author:
Manfred Riem (mriem@manorrock.com)

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void onStartup​(java.util.Set<java.lang.Class<?>> classes, ServletContext servletContext)
    Notify the initializer upon startup.

  • Method Details

    • onStartup

      void onStartup​(java.util.Set<java.lang.Class<?>> classes, ServletContext servletContext) throws ServletException
      Notify the initializer upon startup.
      Parameters:
      classes - the classes to inspect.
      servletContext - the servlet context.
      Throws:
      ServletException - when a servlet error occurs.
